topics.body:
"@hype":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5598a2416368722eb9000117#post_5598a2416368722eb9000117
That's the biggest fucking problem with single season anime; often times they try to go for 24 episodes and as a result it's fucking painful to watch when they don't have enough content to fill that full 24 episodes.

A lot of single season anime do 24/12/6 episodes fine, but when you don't have enough of a story to fill that entire episode list that's when problems arise with pacing and such.  If the powerpuff girls z anime was only say 12 episodes it would have been considerably better.

*edit
I stand corrected; it was 52. . yeah. . that's wayyyyy too many episodes for that anime.
